headline: A Look at United Airlines (UAL) Valuation Following Flight Cancellations Linked to Government Shutdown
summary: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) is in the spotlight after the company confirmed the cancellation of around 510 flights this weekend, following a Federal Aviation Administration directive related to the ongoing U.S. government shutdown. See our latest analysis for United Airlines Holdings. Recent headlines about United’s flight cancellations have certainly grabbed the market’s attention, but over the past year, the company has quietly delivered a solid 7.5% total shareholder return.
